segments.text: Bob , look at this sentence . ' Healthy eating is not about strict nutrition philosophies , staying unrealistically thin , or depriving yourself of foods you love . ' It's interesting , isn't it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'd rather say it's confusing . what are those ' strict nutrition philosophies ' about ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I believe they are careful calculations on proteins , vitamins and calories .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Probably , Rose . That must be the job of nutritionists .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Healthy eating is not about depriving oneself of the foods one loves . So we are free to have whatever foods we love . It is unbelievable .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , believe it or not , I came across an article the other day , saying that pizza is a healthy food .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I felt exactly the same way as you did just now . Scientists must be crazy in saying so .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Maybe nowadays people hold different opinions on healthy diet .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Absolutely right . I myself sometimes believe that healthy eating is just about feeling great . As long as I have enough energy , it's fine .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But one must have some basic ideas about nutrition and find the best way for the nutrients to work out for the body .
segments.speaker: S1
